Communications Panel.description: Metal slats diffuse the volume of a two-way speaker. A small button pops from the bottom corner.
Communications Panel.description_ko: 금속 판이 양방향 스피커의 소리를 분산시킨다. 하단 모서리에서 작은 버튼이 튀어나와 있다.

Control Switch.description: Buttons are set in a vertical pair across a rectangle of scrawled-on metal.
Control Switch.description_ko: 버튼이 긁힌 금속 직사각형에 수직 쌍으로 배치되어 있다.

Chrome Platform.description: A black and grated metal platform is meadowed with the dust of time. It's crisscrossed with the tracks of tiny lifethings.
Chrome Platform.description_ko: 검은색 격자 금속 플랫폼이 시간의 먼지로 덮여 있다. 작은 생명체들의 흔적이 엇갈려 있다.

Power Conduit.description: A conduit for transmitting electrical power.

Generator.description: A machine that generates electrical power.

Solar Collector.description: A device that collects solar energy.

Recharging Station.description: A station for recharging power cells.

Data Terminal.description: A terminal for accessing data systems.

Mainframe Panel.description: A panel of a large mainframe computer system.
